channel.title: Primes on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Primes on Warframe Blog

item.title: How To Get Scindo Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Scindo Prime along with the Hikou Prime and the Nyx Prime have emerged from the Prime Vault. Today I'll be showing you which relics you'll need to farm to get Scindo Prime and where you can farm these relics.

item.description: Hey guys. And the Hikou Prime along with the Nyx Prime and the Scindo Prime have emerged from the Prime Vault. Today I'll be showing you which relics you'll need to farm to get Hikou Prime and where you can farm these relics.
